articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the machine plant managed by Ri Chol Ho.
					 The plant was built in 2013 thanks to the initiative and energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un. It is associated with the leadership feats of him who is working heart and soul to develop the machine-building industry of the country as required by the new century.
					
					 Giving several field guidance to the plant built to meet the requirements of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly civilized socialist country, he set forth a task of developing ultra-modern precision machines and took a measure for doing so.
					
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history, processing and assembly shops, e-library and other places of the plant to acquaint himself in detail with the production and management of the plant.
					
					 He said it was not long since the plant went operational, but a lot of work has been done. He praised it for having made remarkable achievements in the work to increase the variety of machines and improve their quality. 
					
					 The machines produced at the plant are profusely paying off in various fields of the national economy, he said, adding that the key to this success lies in the fact that the plant attached importance to science and technology and closely combined scientific researches with production as intended by the party.
					
					 He noted that the plant is effectively operating the modern e-library provided by the party, thereby successfully conducting the work to fully equip its employees with latest science and technology and broaden their horizons.
					
					 The plant has the very important duty and role to play in building a prosperous country, he said, setting forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the plant.
					
					 He gave the plant instructions for improving the business management and operation as required by the developing reality.
					
					 He said going round the plant he learned well about the very high enthusiasm of its workers who have turned out in the drive for greeting the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor successes. He stressed the need to give fuller play to their mental power so that they may emerge honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Yo Jong and Kim Chang Gwang, vice department directors of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: National Reconciliation Council Brands Park Geun Hye as Matchless Traitor to Nation
articles.content:
National Reconciliation Council Brands Park Geun Hye as Matchless Traitor to Nation
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The worst evil woman Park Geun Hye of south Korea is going busy to pressurize the DPRK to dismantle its powerful nuclear weapons, dignity, pride and symbol of the might of the Korean nation, with the help of outsiders. 
					 A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council in a statement Friday said that her despicable true colors as a traitor to the nation was brought to light with the recent "nuclear security summit" in the U.S. as an occasion. 
					
					 The "nuclear security summit", a brainchild of Obama, was just a cheap trick to decorate the closing days of his tenure, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 That's why Russia, one of the world's nuclear powers, declined to take part in it and not a few countries that participated in it spoke ill of the U.S. hegemonic and aggression criminal moves, making the atmosphere go quite contrary to what the U.S. originally wanted it to be.
					
					 But only Park Geun Hye pulled up the nuclear issue of the DPRK which had nothing to do with the summit and begged for "exerting all efforts for inflicting sanctions and pressure on the north to make it realize it can not survive without dismantling its nuclear weapons".
					
					 It is the principle for anyone to be well aware of one's own nation and to value it just as the nation is above ideology and social system.
					
					 Anything that might reflect the soul of the nation, symbolize its wisdom and might and be able to display its dignity and spirit, should broadmindedly be taken as an immense pride of the nation whether it was made by the north or by the south.
					
					 History records a patriot who ripped his belly open in the eyes of big powers in demand of the restoration of state sovereignty but it has never seen such a traitor as Park who went so foolish as to beg big powers to deprive her own nation of the powerful strength achieved by the efforts of her own fellow countrymen.
					
					 What die-hard pro-American flunkey Park has done is just offering whole south Korea as a theatre for a nuclear war of the U.S., fattening up her American master through the introduction of lethal hardware to south Korea and with the offer of upkeeps for the U.S. forces to make its economy totally dependent on outsiders.
					
					 It is the biggest tragedy and shame on the nation that such an evil woman bringing only unbearable disaster and baneful effect on the nation every minute is still allowed to survive as a member of the nation.
					
					 The Koreans have already crossed off from the list of the Koreans her name, pronoun of treachery and perfidy.
					
					 There will be no place on this land for the worst traitor to the nation to live and she is bound to meet the most wretched end being severely punished by the nation.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Can Not Escape Stern Punishment: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Can Not Escape Stern Punishment: CPRK Secretariat
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued information bulletin no. 1103 Friday to denounce the Park Geun Hye group for viciously resorting to anti-DPRK confrontational conspiracy while branding opposition parties as "pro-north" forces and talking about "threat of provocation from the north" with the upcoming puppet National Assembly election at hand.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The conservative coteries of the "Saenuri Party" are busy kicking up row about "followers of the north, spouting a litany of malignant confrontation remarks. They describe the just demands raised by the opposition democratic forces and people of all social standings against the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war moves as "submission to the north" and "surrender" and bluster that if the opposition parties win the election, "the Kaesong Industrial Park may restart and help the north develop nuclear weapons".
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the Park Geun Hye group which has created terror-ridden atmosphere in south Korea while talking such rubbish as "cyber-terror" from the north, "surprise attack" by drones and "sudden provocation" almost every day.
					
					 This is pursuant to the anti-DPRK scenario deliberately worked out to stave off defeat in the upcoming election.
					
					 It is a hackneyed trick used by the puppet group to become vocal about "threat of provocation from the north" after cooking up "north wind" case whenever it faces extreme crisis.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is now being driven into the tightest corner, being cursed and denounced by the people for the crimes it committed during the past three years of its office that resulted in economic bankruptcy, people's destitution and failure of the north-south relations.
					
					 Much upset by this, the Park group is working desperately to find a way out of it in escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 "Cyber-terror" and "surprise attack" being touted by Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" before the election are nothing but a poor trick to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry south Koreans and win more votes by deceiving them.
					
					 The information bulletin stressed that no base conspiratorial racket against the DPRK being kicked up by Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" will help them escape a stern punishment by the south Koreans.

articles.title: Russian, French Artistes Arrive
articles.content:
Russian, French Artistes Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The chamber trio-instrumentalist group of the Symphony Orchestra of the Khabarovsk Territory of Russia and the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France arrived here on Friday to take part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Marathoners from Rwanda, China, Kenya, Ethiopia and Chinese Taipei arrived here on Friday to take part in the Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon which is to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Participants of the Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on April 1.
					 The message said that all members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and supporters, in the name of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the party, offer Kim Jong Un and, through him, the WPK and all the Korean people congratulations on the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, on April 15, 2016, and the 4th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on April 11 and 13 when the Korean people are celebrating the days as the most auspicious holidays.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and hope he will celebrate these significant days with splendor.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and the 4th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps, on Friday.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here on Friday to celebrate the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, army and state officials, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of institutions, industrial establishments and labor innovators in Pyongyang.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The sacred title as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK is deeply cherished not only by the army and people of the DPRK but also by the progressives as his noble image and banner of all victories and glory as it comprehensively represents the personality of Kim Jong Il as a matchlessly great man and the great exploits he performed on behalf of the country, revolution, times and history.
					
					 He explored a new way of building the socialist state in the Songun era guided by the original Songun revolutionary idea and established the state machinery with the NDC as a pivot of national defense, thus providing a powerful weapon for implementing the Songun politics.
					
					 He consolidated in every way the single-minded unity of the leader, party, army and people, the mainstay of the revolution, building a powerful driving force for the Korean revolution and glorifying the DPRK as an invincible political and ideological power for the first time in the world.
					
					 He steadily bolstered up the country's military capabilities with the Korean People's Army as the core, turning the DPRK into a world's military power and firmly defending the socialist country.
					
					 He laid a solid material and technological foundation for enabling the DPRK to rapidly develop into a prosperous socialist economic power.
					
					 His idea and cause of nation-building in the Songun era are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un held in high esteem Kim Jong Il as eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK reflecting the unanimous will of the army and people of the DPRK and the best wishes of all Koreans and put forward Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the ever-lasting guiding idea of our party and revolution and developed the DPRK government into a powerful political weapon to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 He has bolstered up the country's defence capability with nuclear force as its pivot as firm as a rock under the uplifted banner of Songun, thus putting the country's dignity and national power on the highest level and demonstrating its might before the whole world. 
					
					 The reporter called for steadily augmenting the overall national power of the DPRK under the uplifted banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and ushering in the greatest heyday of building a thriving nation this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il as eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK for all ages, adhere to the principle of independence, Songun and socialism which he regarded as his maxim and embodied all his life in the nation-building and activities and thus steadily demonstrate the dignity and might as Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's state which stands unshakable despite complicated world-wide political upheavals.
					
					 The reporter called for sharpening the treasured sword of nuclear weapons for self-defence in order to contain and frustrate the last-ditch desperate war hysteria for aggression kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, firmly defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and certainly achieve the country's reunification, the greatest desire of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever boost the solidarity with the world people opposing aggression and war, domination and subjugation and expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with all countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly towards it, the reporter concluded, he added.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Friday.
					 Players displayed the special skills they cultivated in their day-to-day trainings at the championship, producing many promising players.
					
					 In the Taekwon-Do event, the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team placed first in team standing.
					
					 Choe Hyon Il (man) and Sin Jong Hwa (woman), players of the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, were awarded individual technical prizes.
					
					 Men players of the South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do Team and women players of the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team came first in the group sparring matches.
					
					 In the Paduk games, the South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do Team came first.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, players, coaches and working people in the city.

articles.title: 21st Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
articles.content:
21st Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The 21st Cooking Festival took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House from April 6 to 8 with the approach of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 It was divided into the exhibition of scientific and technical achievements in cooking, exhibition of famous dishes and local specialties, exhibition of compulsory dishes and the contest of practical skills and demonstration of cooks and waiters and waitresses.
					
					 It was attended by at least 60 units of ministries and national institutions and all provinces.
					
					 Presented there were more than 1,200 dishes and drinks made by those in the public service field across the country in a peculiar manner and over 70 scientific and technical achievements.
					
					 On display were dishes and processed foodstuff and processing equipment contrived and introduced by public catering establishments in recent years, cuisine books, CDs, etc.
					
					 Other exhibitions revved up the mood of the festival.
					
					 There were also demonstration of cooks and waiters and waitresses of various units such as Hyangmanru Restaurant, Yanggakdo International Hotel and the Central District Restaurants Management Office.
					
					 A closing ceremony of the festival was held on Friday.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Officials and Members of Women's Union Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Officials and Members of Women's Union Held
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a dancing party of officials and members of the women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Friday on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The participants danced amid the playing of songs "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", "The General Star beyond the Clouds" and "It Is Spring Ray and Sunray".
					
					 They enthusiastically danced to the tune of songs like "Joy of the People" full of national pride and self-confidence with the honor of being blessed with the sun generation after generation as they have another great man of Mt. Paektu-type.

articles.title: Rapid Economic Growth Witnessed in DPRK
articles.content:
Rapid Economic Growth Witnessed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made a rapid progress in major construction or reconstruction projects and industrial production in recent 40 days after the start of the 70-day campaign.
					 In particular, Pyongyang, its capital city, showed an increase of twice in the tempo of construction or reconstruction projects and 1.6 times in industrial production.
					
					 The Aeguk Vegetable Processing Factory and the Mangyongdae Children's Camp were rebuilt on a modern basis and the second-stage renovation of the Central Zoo is progressing apace at the final stage.
					
					 Besides, 80 percent of total work has been carried out in scores of construction and reconstruction projects, including the Ryuwon Shoes Factory, Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory and the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory.
					
					 Electricity and coal outputs went up at thermal-power and hydro-power stations and coal mines.
					
					 The Pyongyang Steel Works and the Pyongyang Cast Iron Pipe Factory fulfilled their production plans 120 percent on an average, 150 percent to the maximum.
					
					 An increasing number of units in light industry and foodstuff industry have finished their yearly and half-yearly production quotas.
					
					 Such successes are reported from railway, agricultural and other industrial sectors.

articles.title: Forest-Fire Information Service Started in DPRK
articles.content:
Forest-Fire Information Service Started in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The forest-fire information service began in the DPRK from early March.
					 Through this nationwide service system, relevant units and forest restoration campaign commands in every city, county and province can immediately get information on forest fire verified with satellite images and digital forest map.
					
					 And the system would be helpful to putting out forest fire.

articles.title: Magnetization-based Water Purifier Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Magnetization-based Water Purifier Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Environmental Sanitation Institute under the Academy of Medical Science in the DPRK developed a magnetization-based water purifier. 
					 The new purifier, manufactured with use of rare-earth permanent magnet and far infrared rays and millimeter wave technologies, helps ensure turbidity of water less than 0.5, and it is applicable to industrial and household use.
					
					 Magnetized water removes effete matter and toxic agents from human body. And it is helpful to improving the taste of food and promoting digestion and absorption. It also emits anions good for human health.
					
					 This water can be used for cultivation of domestic animals, fish and plants.
					
					 Its association degree is below 6.
					
					 The newly-developed purifier has already been introduced to a number of foodstuff factories, hostels and families, enjoying public favor.

articles.title: Modernization Progresses Apace at Foodstuff Factories
articles.content:
Modernization Progresses Apace at Foodstuff Factories
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries in the DPRK has pushed ahead with the modernization of affiliated factories in the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					 Among them are the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, the Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory and the Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory.
					
					 In particular, the Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory made such achievements as remodeling packing and other processes and putting injection molding process under complete monitorial control.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses "Provocation" Touted by Obama as Height of Shamelessness
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses "Provocation" Touted by Obama as Height of Shamelessness
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama in an article contributed to the Washington Post in the run-up to the "nuclear security summit" claimed that the UN Security Council's "additional sanctions" against north Korea showed it has to pay a price for its "provocation." 
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is the U.S. and its allies that are real provocateurs bringing heavy clouds of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula. However, Obama is vociferating about "provocation" by someone. It is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 Humiliating self-restraint and concession lead to more horrible destruction and upheaval and a lot of people meet miserable deaths. This is the bloody lesson drawn by history.
					
					 The U.S., the biggest nuclear weapons state and only user of A-bombs in the world, designated the DPRK as the target of preemptive nuclear attack and has steadily posed nuclear threats to it, watching for a chance to bring down it. Under this condition, for the KPA to counter it with a decisive preemptive nuclear strike in case there is the slightest sign of the enemy's movement is a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence to protect security and peace of the country.
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK will mobilize all the means including nuclear force and mercilessly punish the aggressors and provocateurs the moment they encroach upon the supreme interests and sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit, and root out the very source of threats to its sovereignty and peace and security of the region.
					
					 The world will see how the service personnel and people united close around the supreme headquarters with one idea and purpose will emerge a winner in the decades-long standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Purpose of Row about "North Wind" Kicked up by Representative of "Saenuri Party"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Purpose of Row about "North Wind" Kicked up by Representative of "Saenuri Party"
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Traitor Kim Mu Song, representative of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, frequenting Seoul, Inchon, Kyonggi Province, Pusan and other areas every day since March 31, spouted a litany of invectives that in case an opposition party wins the "National Assembly" elections, the "anti-terrorism law" will be abrogated and the Kaesong Industrial Park will re-start and that voting for the opposition parties means "helping the north make nuclear bombs."
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This "north wind" racket is a trite method employed by the conservative group whenever it finds itself in a crisis.
					
					 When the election campaigns start, the conservative party never failed to kick up the "north wind" row, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is needless to say that the "north wind" row is aimed to rally conservative forces by turning the south Korean society into mayhem of the anti-DPRK confrontation and tip the election situation in its favor. This is why Kim Mu Song is spearheading the "north wind" racket.
					
					 To pin hope on the sycophants towards America and traitors is as foolish an act as bringing misfortune and pain to the south Korean people again.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye also trumpeted about "security" as loudly as Kim Mu Song when she was holding the post of the representative of the ruling party. But after becoming the boss of the Chongwadae she is resorting to such reckless acts without hesitation which even traitor Lee Myung Bak dared not to do, bringing the inter-Korean relations to total deadlock and staging largest-ever nuclear war rehearsals for invading the north in collusion with the U.S. Consequently, she has pushed the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 This goes to prove that the "Saenuri Party" is the war party and the party for confrontation wrecking peace of the country and doing harm to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: New Type U.S. Spy Plane Will Meet Same Fate as That of EC-121: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
New Type U.S. Spy Plane Will Meet Same Fate as That of EC-121: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going to conduct the first test flight of a new type spy plane in Texas, together with south Korean puppet forces.
					 The spy plane is reported to be a combination of systems of south Korea's industrial technology and the U.S. technological assistance.
					
					 It will be reportedly deployed in south Korea till the end of this year after undergoing the test of its performance and will form the core of Kill Chain, a preemptive strike system targeting the north established under the pretext of coping with the "north's nuclear and missile threats".
					
					 This is an extremely reckless move to ignite a war for deliberately escalating tension on the Korean peninsula as it is an inevitable product of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' hostile policy toward the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet army are nuclear warmongers and the group of aggressors as they infiltrate strategic reconnaissance and other planes into the airspace of the DPRK so frequently and bring clouds of a war to hang over the Korean peninsula by flying aircraft for strategic nuclear strikes.
					
					 U-2 and other strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with different missions are busy spying on the Korean peninsula every day.
					
					 Even at this moment, more than 300,000 huge forces of the U.S. and south Korean puppet army and U.S. nuclear strategic weaponry including B-52 nuclear strategic bombers, nuclear submarines and nuclear carrier task force and F-22A are busy with nuclear war rehearsals.
					
					 It is needless to say that they seriously infringe upon peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and pose a direct threat to the right to live of the Korean people and the peoples in the region.
					
					 It is another intolerable war crime that the U.S. is working hard to provide core parts of the reconnaissance plane to the south Korean puppet forces to round off the work of its production and deploy them in south Korea.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to prod the south Korean puppet army into spying on the north frequently so that it may gather all sorts of information necessary for igniting a new war, work out war plans on the basis of information and apply them to an actual war.
					
					 But the U.S. is sadly mistaken.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have never shown even the slightest mercy to the enemies when they were trying to intrude into the territorial air and waters of the DPRK even 0.001mm.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist plane EC-121 was brought down while intruding into the territorial air of the DPRK and RC-135 was also downed by the brave pilots of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo was captured and PCE No. 56 of the south Korean puppet army was sunk while intruding into the territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are defending this land for the dignity and honor of Songun Korea, fully ready to wipe out the enemies with merciless blows if a war breaks out.
					
					 The DPRK always remains invulnerable. As there are army and people strong in idea and faith who are full of courage to firmly defend the inviolable territorial air and waters and land of the socialist country with self-blasting spirit, it neither makes an empty talk nor shows any mercy to the enemies.
					
					 The enemies are within the firing range of various type ultra-modern weapons made by the DPRK on its own efforts and with its indigenous technology. It is fully prepared to wipe them out to the last man. 
					
					 If the U.S. together with the south Korean puppet forces persistently monitors and spies the whole of the Korean peninsula and uses intelligence for its aggressive operation scenarios for a new war, it will only invite self-destruction.
					
					 If the U.S. instigates the south Korean puppet forces to infiltrate the reconnaissance plane into the DPRK in disregard of the warning of its army and people, it will meet the same fate as that of EC-121.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Busy with War Exercises against North
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Busy with War Exercises against North
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are getting frantic with drills for invading the north in various parts of south Korea while reckless Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers are under way.
					 On Tuesday the 12th Division of the 1st Flying Corps of the U.S. Marines staged a joint flight drill with the 16th Combat Flying Corps of the south Korean puppet air force.
					
					 On the same day the south Korean warmongers on Paekryong Island were busy for war exercise, firing hundreds of live shells at a naval target with Cobra attack helicopters involved to confirm the offensive operation capability.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 6th Engineer Brigade of the puppet army staged a madcap river-crossing drill with the 1st Armored Brigade of the U.S.-south Korea Combined Dvision in Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province under the simulated conditions of attack on the north.

articles.title: S. Koreans' Due Criticism of Traitor Syngman Rhee
articles.content:
S. Koreans' Due Criticism of Traitor Syngman Rhee
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Recently a conservative organization staged a "prize contest of poems on Syngman Rhee" at which it held an event for awarding prizes to those poems liked by it out of them, according to the south Korean CBS on Monday.
					 But it was confirmed that two poems which proved successful in the contest revealed crimes of Syngman Rhee. Much upset by this, the jury hastily cancelled the awarding event and deleted them from the list of winners.
					
					  The poems deal with the records of the traitor who was ousted  and met a miserable end for perpetrating indelible crimes by cooking up the puppet regime with the strong backing of the U.S.

articles.title: Concert Celebrates Day of Sun in U.S.
articles.content:
Concert Celebrates Day of Sun in U.S.
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A concert "April Spring" took place with splendor at the Merkin Theatre in Manhattan of New York City on April 2 with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). It was performed by Korean artistes in the U.S. and American artistes.
					 It was enjoyed by Koreans in the U.S., Americans, members of the DPRK permanent mission in the UN and foreign diplomats.
					
					 It began with violin concerto "Nostalgia", a masterpiece, conducted by Ri Jun Mu, head of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra. Put on the stage were such pieces as "We Pledge," fourth movement of the symphony "Leader Is Always with Us" which shows the faith and will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to hold President Kim Il Sung as the sun of Juche for all ages, orchestra "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain" and female solo "Let's Go to Mountains and Seas" and foreign classical music.
					
					 The concert reached its climax with the performance of the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The audience said despite the recent tense situation in which the DPRK-U.S. relations have been frozen and the Korean peninsula has been driven to the brink of war, the hymn of the sun echoed in the U.S. once again, praising the DPRK for fully displaying its dignity and might.

articles.title: Honorary Citizenship of Ecuador Awarded to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Honorary Citizenship of Ecuador Awarded to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The title of honorary citizenship of Saquisili City, Cotopaxi Province, Ecuador was awarded to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificates of honorary citizenship took place on April 1.
					
					 At the ceremony resolutions of the city government council on awarding the title of honorary citizenship to the peerlessly great persons were read out.
					
					 The resolutions said that the title of honorary citizenship is awarded to the peerlessly great persons of the DPRK, expressing admiration and friendship to the Korean people and revolution advancing under the banner of the Juche idea and reflecting the will of the city government and citizens to boost the fraternal ties and solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 The mayor of the city conveyed the certificates to the head of the group of Korean doctors giving help in Koryo medicine.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the city government council, the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and other organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and members of the group of Korean doctors giving help in Koryo medicine working in Ecuador.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in India
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was published in booklet by the Indian newspaper Indian and World Event.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies the idea that the seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the party is always sure to triumph.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the newspaper on March 31.

articles.title: Indian Figure Praises Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
Indian Figure Praises Kim Jong Un's Work
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will surely display its might as powerful country as there are the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Marshal Kim Jong Un and the service personnel and people united close around it.
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and editor of the newspaper Indian and World Event, said this at a ceremony of releasing Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" held on March 31.
					
					 Expressing pleasure over the publication of the work the chairman said that Marshal Kim Jong Un in the work dealt with the proud course covered by the WPK under the distinguished and tested leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and set forth the tasks for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and ways for doing so.
					
					 Indeed, the work is the revolutionary textbook reflecting Kim Jong Un's steadfast faith and will to develop the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and thus achieve the final victory of the cause of Juche revolution, the chairman added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its special bulletin "Star of Independence" on March 19 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Italy
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Milano on April 1.
					 The official representative of the Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity who holds the same post at the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and hold colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Polish Body Praises Invincible WPK
articles.content:
Polish Body Praises Invincible WPK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on March 29 posted an article titled "Invincible Workers' Party of Korea" on its website to mark the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said:
					
					 The WPK is being praised not only as a revolutionary party of Juche-type that leads the Korean people to victory but an invincible party that pushes forward the revolution and construction without any frustration and failure despite all ordeals, holding high the banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The guiding ideology of the WPK is the Juche idea, Songun idea which correctly reflects the desire and wish of the popular masses and the requirement of the times.
					
					 The WPK is emerging victorious guided by great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The WPK's invincibility is attributable to the ideological unity of the whole party around the leader which provides a firm guarantee for the victory of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK has maintained an invariable principle of thoroughly carrying forward the idea and will of the leader without an inch of deflection.

articles.title: Peruvian Personage Supports DPRK's Line of Building Economy and Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Peruvian Personage Supports DPRK's Line of Building Economy and Nuclear Force
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Cati Campos Rontop, general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, released a statement on March 31 on the 3rd anniversary of the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK marked the 3rd anniversary of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts with great joy and happiness.
					
					 For the past three years many world-startling successes have been made in the DPRK.
					
					 It was because the DPRK worked world-startling miracle and ranked itself among the advanced nuclear weapons states that we were so pleased with the news about the DPRK's success in the H-bomb test in January.
					
					 The reality shows the repeated setback of the U.S. and its followers in their moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Organizations on Justice of DPRK's Measures
articles.content:
Russian Organizations on Justice of DPRK's Measures
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Russian Institute of Kimilsungism- Kimjongilism, the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism and the Kim Jong Suk Womenâ€™s Union of Russia in a joint statement on April 2 said that justice of measures taken by the DPRK will be clearly proven and growing voices supporting it be heard on a daily basis. 
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Very just are the measures taken by the DPRK to preserve the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have suffered only disgraceful defeat by the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The reality shows that the DPRK will win a victory in showdown with the U.S.
					
					 We extend solidarity to the DPRK countering the U.S. with dignity in order to achieve the sovereignty, right to existence and peaceful development of the country and the nation.
					
					 We will carry on positive activities to bring the Russian people to the just measures of the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Organization Slams Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Japan's Organization Slams Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Japan Nagasaki Society for Protecting Human Rights of Koreans in Japan in a statement on March 22 denounced the government for its criminal independent sanctions against the DPRK. 
					 The statement clarified the injustice of the independent sanctions taken by the authorities under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch. 
					
					 A particular thing to be mentioned is the unrestricted tightened embargo on reentry of all Korean residents in Japan, a serious human rights abuse contrary to international law, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The Japanese government should promote the Japan-DPRK diplomatic relations in accordance with the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang declaration and Stockholm agreement.
					
					 The statement brought to light the Japanese authorities' attempt to pull up the DPRK's satellite launch as a "missile launch". This can never be allowed as they denied the DPRK's rights to space use for peaceful purposes recognized by international law, it held.
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop at once the independent sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquinaria donde trabaja Ri Chol Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquinaria donde trabaja Ri Chol Ho
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria donde trabaja Ri Chol Ho.
					En la fabrica, levantada en 2013 gracias a la iniciativa directa y la orientacion abnegada del Mariscal, estan impregnadas las hazanas de direccion de ese gran hombre quien dedica toda su abnegacion para desarrollar mas la industria de maquinaria del pais segun el requerimiento del nuevo siglo.
					
					Visitando en varias ocasiones la fabrica construida conforme a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad y a la figura del pais civilizado socialista, el Mariscal presento la tarea de investigacion y desarrollo de maquinas de precision sofisticadas y tomo las medidas para su realizacion.
					
					Recorriendo la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, el lugar de procesamiento y de montaje, la biblioteca electronica y otros puntos de la fabrica, averiguo en detalles el estado de produccion y administracion. 
					
					El Mariscal dijo que la fabrica ha hecho muchos trabajos aunque fue inaugurada hace poco y evaluo que ha logrado muchos exitos en la lucha por incrementar el numero de variedades de los productos mecanicos y mejorar su calidad.
					
					Subrayo que las maquinas producidas en la fabrica surten gran efecto en varios sectores de la economia nacional y anadio que la llave reside en que la fabrica dio importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas segun el proposito del partido y acoplo estrictamente la investigacion cientifica y la produccion.
					
					Asevero que la fabrica realiza bien la labor de armar con firmeza a los empleados con las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas y ensanchar su vision al gestionar bien la moderna biblioteca electronica preparada por el partido.
					
					Son muy importantes la mision y el papel que asume la fabrica en la construccion de una patria prospera, destaco y presento las tareas que se presentan ante ella.
					
					Dio instrucciones que se presentan en mejorar la administracion y gestion empresariales conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Recalco que a traves de la visita pudo conocer bien que es muy elevado el entusiasmo de la clase obrera de la fabrica movilizada para acoger el VII Congreso del PTC con los exitos laborales sin precedentes e hizo hincapie en que deben avivar mas su poderio espiritual para hacer que los obreros de la fabrica sean triunfadores en la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Yo Jong y Kim Chang Gwang, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Banda de Park Geun-hye no puede eludir severa sentencia, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
Banda de Park Geun-hye no puede eludir severa sentencia, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 8 la informacion no.1103 denunciando a la banda titere surcoreana de Park Geun-hye que en visperas de las elecciones de diputados a la "Asamblea Nacional", se enfrasca con frenesi en la campana conflictiva contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tildando a un partido opositor de fuerza "pro-Norte" y hablando de la "amenaza de provocacion del Norte". 
					Los compinches conservadores del "Partido Saenuri" califican de "sumision y capitulacion al Norte" la justa demanda de las fuerzas democraticas fuera del poder y los habitantes de distintos estratos sociales que rechazan la confrontacion fratricida y los alborotos belicos, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Y arman alboroto contra las fuerzas "pro-Norte" diciendo que la victoria del partido en oposicion en las elecciones "rehabilitara la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y ayudara el desarrollo de armas nucleares del Norte". 
					
					En particular, la horda de Park crea el ambiente de panico horrible en la sociedad surcoreana hablando diariamente del "terrorismo cibernetico", "asalto sorpresivo" por drones y "provocacion de modo de hacer ruido en el oeste y atacar por el este". 
					
					Es una artimana premeditada para no sufrir la derrota en las proximas elecciones de diputados a la "asamblea nacional". 
					
					Inventar un incidente intrigante del "viento del Norte" hablando de la "amenaza de provocacion del Norte" es un metodo rutinario que utilizan los titeres surcoreanos cada vez que se encontraban en una crisis extremada. 
					
					Ahora la camarilla de Park es repudiada y rechazada por la poblacion surcoreana y se encuentra en el dilema sin salida por sus crimenes de haber llevado a la bancarrota la economia, la vida de la poblacion y las relaciones intercoreanas durante tres anos de su mandato. 
					
					Muy aturdida por ello, la horda de Park busca la salida en el enfrentamiento anti-RPDC. 
					
					El "terrorismo cibernetico" y el "asalto sorpresivo" de que hablan tan ruidosamente Park Geun-hye y el "Partido Saenuri" en visperas de las elecciones no pasan de ser una artimana pueril para ganar la mayoria de votos desviando la atencion de la poblacion indignada y enganando la opinion publica.
					
					Pero, con los alborotos intrigantes anti-RPDC de todo tipo no pueden eludir nunca la severa sentencia de la poblacion surcoreana.

articles.title: Hay que extirpar a Park Geun-hye del territorio coreano, insiste CRN
articles.content:
Hay que extirpar a Park Geun-hye del territorio coreano, insiste CRN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- La traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye calumnia tanto el disuasivo nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, simbolo de la dignidad, el orgullo y el poderio de la nacion, y actua con absurdidad para eliminarlo a toda costa en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					Su naturaleza villana se revelo de nuevo en la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear", recien efectuada en Estados Unidos. 
					
					Senala el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) en su declaracion publicada el dia 8 y continua:
					
					La "cumbre de seguridad nacional" fue inventada por Obama a fin de embellecer el ultimo periodo de su mandato, razon por la cual hasta la potencia nuclear mundial Rusia nego la participacion y no pocos paises asistentes denunciaron la actitud hegemonica y agresiva de EE.UU. llevando el ambiente en contra de la voluntad de este imperio. 
					
					Pero, solo la traidora Park Geun-hye volvio a cuestionar el problema nuclear de la RPDC que no tiene nada que ver con el debate y solicito "concentrar todas las fuerzas en ejercer la sancion y la presion sobre el Norte de Corea para que este comprenda que no podria existir sin la renuncia nuclear". 
					
					La nacion se encuentra sobre la ideologia y el regimen. Pues, los seres humanos, por su instinto, deben conocer bien y apreciar mucho a su propia nacion. 
					
					Los coreanos deben aceptar como orgullo todos los exitos, sean del Norte o del Sur, que reflejan el espiritu nacional, simbolizan la inteligencia y el poderio de la nacion y ostentan la dignidad e impetu nacionales. 
					
					En la historia humana hubo un patriota que abrio el vientre exigiendo la recuperacion del poder estatal ante las potencias, pero no vimos ni un traidor absurdo que pidio a las fuerzas extranjeras arrebatar el fuerte poderio nacional. 
					
					Lo que hizo Park Geun-hye, acostumbrada a la dependencia de EE.UU. y a la tradicion a la nacion, es que convirtio el territorio surcoreano en el campo de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., satisfizo la codicia de su amo con la compra de armamentos mortiferos y el pago de gastos para el mantenimiento de las tropas norteamericanas y entrego la economia a las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Es una tragedia y verguenza intolerable la existencia de este monstruo que acarrea incontables desgracias y consecuencias perjudiciales a la nacion coreana.
					
					La nacion coreana tacho ya hace mucho tiempo de la lista de los coreanos el nombre de Park Geun-hye, pronombre de la  traicion a la nacion. 
					
					La traidora virulenta Park Geun-hye, que no tiene el refugio en este territorio nacional, sera condenada a duras penas por toda la nacion y sufrira el fin mas tragico.

articles.title: Acto central por 23o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Acto central por 23o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en esta capital el acto central por el 23o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, funcionarios e innovadores laborales de los organismos, fabricas y empresas en esta capital. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					El informante dijo que el sagrado cargo del Presidente del CDN de la RPDC implica las nobles e incomparables personalidades del Dirigente y sus grandes hazanas acumuladas ante la patria, la revolucion, la epoca y la historia, razon por la cual esta conservado profundamente en el alma del ejercito y pueblo coreanos y la humanidad progresista como imagen venerable del Dirigente y bandera de todas las victorias y glorias. 
					
					Con la original idea revolucionaria del Songun, el Dirigente allano el nuevo camino de la construccion de un Estado socialista de la era del Songun y establecio el sistema de aparatos estatales que dan preferencia a la defensa nacional y asi preparo una poderosa arma para realizar la politica de Songun, ratifico y continuo:
					
					Al consolidar, por todos los medios, la unidad monolitica entre el lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo, el Dirigente preparo el poderoso sujeto independiente de la revolucion coreana y desarrollo la RPDC como invicta potencia ideo-politica. 
					
					Convirtio la RPDC en la potencia militar de talla mundial y defendio con firmeza la patria socialista mediante el aumento de la capacidad militar del pais teniendo como pilar al ejercito popular. 
					
					Asento la firme base tecnico-material que asegura la conversion de la RPDC en la potencia economica socialista en prosperidad. 
					
					La idea del Dirigente en materia de la construccion de Estado de la era del Songun y sus proezas se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El Mariscal enaltecio al Dirigente como eterno Presidente del CDN de la RPDC, reflejando la unanime voluntad de los militares y civiles coreanos y el anhelo de toda la nacion, presento el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como eterna guia directriz del PTC y de la revolucion coreana, y desarrollo el poder estatal como poderosa arma politica a favor de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					Manteniendo invariablemente la bandera del Songun, fortalecio como muralla de acero la capacidad de defensa nacional del pais tomando como columna vertebral las fuerzas  armadas nucleares. De esta manera, lleva a la maxima altura y ostenta a todo el mundo la dignidad nacional y el poderio estatal. 
					
					Es necesario aumentar incesantemente el poderio estatal en conjunto de la RPDC bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y abrir una era dorada de la construccion de un Estado prospero en este ano en que se celebrara el VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Hay que enaltecer eternamente al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC y mantener cabalmente el principio de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo en la construccion y las actividades estatales para manifestar de continuo la dignidad y el poderio del Estado de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que no vacila ante la confusion politica mundial de toda indole. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos defenderan con firmeza la soberania y dignidad del pais frustrando con el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa la locura agonizante de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. y sus satelites y lograran sin falta la reunificacion de la patria, supremo anhelo nacional.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC fomentara en el futuro tambien la solidaridad con los pueblos del mundo opositores a la agresion, la guerra, la dominacion y la subyugacion y ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises que respeten la soberania de la RPDC y la traten con amabilidad.
